question: Analyze the social media presence of technology companies in the industry and identify their audience engagement metrics.

subtasks.task: Gather a list of technology companies and their relevant social media profile links.
Retrieve Facebook engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) for each technology company.
Retrieve Instagram engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rate) for each technology company.
Retrieve Twitter engagement metrics (likes, retweets, comments) for each technology company.
Retrieve YouTube engagement data (likes, comments, views) for each technology company.
Compile and analyze the aggregated data to identify trends and audience engagement strategies used by these companies.
